commit message: Port of 1.25->1.26 changes: drawable, layout, res.
Hide refresh button if running on a device with the ActionBar
Fix: different handling of themes depending on presence of ActionBar
Cleaned refresh button w/ refresh menu icon
Fix: about screen with parametric views
Don't close the app on APPLY
Ensure previous stats are, indeed, from the past.
Add russian translation update I forgot to grab from getLocalization.
Fix: NPE when persisting reset-state on devices with no stats available.
Hide launcher icon if special files are present (aimed to ROM developers).
Updated translations from GetLocalization: ca-rD, de, el, fr, ja, nl, tr.
Github #1: Invalid calculation of number of cpus.
Fix [#2]: Use /sys/block/mtdblock0 when sys/block/mmcblk0 doesn't exist.
Play Store release 1.28.1 w/ explicit ACCESS_SUPERUSER permission.
